data.comment: The big names in today's match at BayArena have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Leverkusen.
Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
Frankfurt drives forward and Daichi Kamada gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Leverkusen.
Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frankfurt are whistled for offside.
Goal! Kai Havertz gives Leverkusen a 1-0 lead.
Moussa Diaby with an assist there.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
Felix Brych signals a throw-in for Leverkusen, close to Frankfurt's area.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Leverkusen drive upfield and Paulinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Frankfurt defender.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Attention is being given to Frankfurt’s Andre Silva and play has been suspended briefly.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Frankfurt’s Andre Silva is on his feet again at BayArena.
Free kick Leverkusen.
Goal! Leverkusen extend their lead to 2-0 through Karim Bellarabi.
Great play from Paulinho to set up the goal.
Felix Brych signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Filip Kostic of Frankfurt smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Frankfurt.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
In Leverkusen, Frankfurt push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at BayArena.
Felix Brych signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
Leverkusen needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
[36] is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Frankfurt's [36] looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match at BayArena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sven Bender, who is down injured.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Jonathan Tah (Leverkusen) has replaced the possibly injured Sven Bender at BayArena.
Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
Karim Bellarabi for Leverkusen drives towards goal at BayArena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Frankfurt.
Leverkusen's Wendell breaks free at BayArena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at BayArena.
Throw-in high up the field for Leverkusen in Leverkusen.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Frankfurt.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Felix Brych signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Felix Brych awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
At BayArena, Leverkusen are penalized for being offside.
Goal! Paulinho extends Leverkusen's lead to 3-0.
Karim Bellarabi instrumental with a fine assist.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Leverkusen.
Mitchell Weiser for Leverkusen has been booked by Felix Brych and receives a first yellow card.
Frankfurt pushes forward through Martin Hinteregger, whose finish on goal is saved.
Frankfurt's Martin Hinteregger gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Paulinho.
That's a fine assist from Kai Havertz.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Daichi Kamada with Mijat Gacinovic.
Adi Hutter is making the team's second substitution at BayArena with Djibril Sow replacing Dominik Kohr.
Leverkusen are coming forward and Moussa Diaby gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at BayArena.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured [36].
Frankfurt advance rapidly upfield but Felix Brych blows for offside.
Leon Bailey is on a sub for Kai Havertz for Leverkusen.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Peter Bosz (Leverkusen) is making a third substitution, with Exequiel Palacios replacing Charles Aranguiz.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
The away team have replaced Andre Silva with Goncalo Paciencia. This is the third substitution made today by Adi Hutter.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Frankfurt's Goncalo Paciencia gets in a shot on goal at BayArena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Goncalo Paciencia for Frankfurt gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Felix Brych awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Leverkusen's [49] misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Frankfurt's Evan N`Dicka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leverkusen defender.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Julian Baumgartlinger (Leverkusen) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Karim Bellarabi (Leverkusen) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Leverkusen.
Martin Hinteregger (Frankfurt) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at BayArena.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Frankfurt.
Important block from the Frankfurt defence as Karim Bellarabi fires in a strike for Leverkusen.
Leverkusen have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
Mijat Gacinovic of Frankfurt gets in a strike, but is off target.
Felix Brych awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
It's 4-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
